clustersList.name: Physical & Cognitive Impairments Prevention
clustersList.description: This cluster includes non-functional needs related to gamified rehabilitation, encouragement for regular physical and mental activity, adaptive challenge levels, and mechanisms for boosting motivation and adherence. It ensures ALFRED supports sustained wellness through accessible and enjoyable prevention strategies.
